Text: EEIHelping to keep you informedDear Customer The electric utility industry is rapidly changing As companies explore new business opportunities you need to stay informed EEI can help Stay ahead of the changes with EEIs newly expanded Business Activities of ShareholderOwned Electric Utilities This report describes the products and services offered for ALL of the US shareholderowned electric utility holding companies plus others Business Activities attempts to document the future directions of the industry by revealing the companies strategic goals as stated in K reports The report includes information on Diversification Products and Services Company Structure Merger Activity Strategic Goals Leadership Business Outlook Available as both a print publication and a PDF file EEI September List price For more information or to order go to productsindustrybusinessactivitieshtm We hope you found this message useful However if youd rather not receive future emails of this sort from EEI please send a message to and reference this email
